briefdescription.para: Constructor.
Copy constructor.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDC &dc, wxRichTextDrawingContext &context, const wxRichTextRange &range, const wxRichTextSelection &selection, const wxRect &rect, int descent, int style)
memberdef.name: Draw

briefdescription.para: Draw the item, within the given range.

detaileddescription.para: Some objects may ignore the range (for example paragraphs) while others must obey it (lines, to implement wrapping)

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDC &dc, wxRichTextDrawingContext &context, const wxRect &rect, const wxRect &parentRect, int style)
memberdef.name: Layout

briefdescription.para: Lay the item out at the specified position with the given size constraint.

detaileddescription.para: Layout must set the cached size. rect is the available space for the object, and parentRect is the container that is used to determine a relative size or position (for example if a text box must be 50% of the parent text box).

memberdef.argsstring: (const wxRichTextRange &range, wxSize &size, int &descent, wxDC &dc, wxRichTextDrawingContext &context, int flags, const wxPoint &position=wxPoint(0, 0), const wxSize &parentSize=wxDefaultSize, wxArrayInt *partialExtents=NULL) const
memberdef.name: GetRangeSize

briefdescription.para: Returns the object size for the given range.

detaileddescription.para: Returns false if the range is invalid for this object.

briefdescription.para: Returns any text in this object for the given range.
Do a split from pos, returning an object containing the second part, and setting the first part in 'this'.
Calculates the range of the object.

detaileddescription.para: By default, guess that the object is 1 unit long.

briefdescription.para: Deletes the given range.
Returns true if the object is empty.
Returns true if this object can merge itself with the given one.
Returns true if this object merged itself with the given one.

detaileddescription.para: The calling code will then delete the given object.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if this object can potentially be split, by virtue of having different virtual attributes for individual sub-objects.
Returns the final object in the split objects if this object was split due to differences between sub-object virtual attributes.

detaileddescription.para: Returns itself if it was not split.

briefdescription.para: Dump object data to the given output stream for debugging.
Get the first position from pos that has a line break character.
Does this object take note of paragraph attributes? Text and image objects don't.
Imports this object from XML.
Returns the XML node name of this object.

detaileddescription.para: This must be overridden for wxXmlNode-base XML export to work.

briefdescription.para: Returns the text.
Sets the text.
Clones the object.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDC &dc, const wxRichTextAttr &attr, const wxRect &rect, wxString &str, wxCoord &x, wxCoord &y, bool selected)
memberdef.name: DrawTabbedString

briefdescription.para: This object represents a single piece of text.
